pullrequest.title: Migrate to ign-math3. Fix the Windows build

content.raw:
Nice fix! I'm wondering if upgrading to ign-math3 was the only solution for the windows build though. [SDFormat for example is ok with ign-math2](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-windows7-amd64/17/).

A couple of other things to consider here:

* pull request #21
* [This](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2588/depend-on-ign-math3/diff#comment-29577581) comment
